mapper.insert: insert into biz_clnt(posNum, regNum, vanNum, repreName, compaName, phoneNum, addr) values(#{posNum},#{regNum},#{vanNum},#{repreName},#{compaName},#{phoneNum},#{addr})
mapper.select: select posNum, regNum, vanNum, repreName, compaName, phoneNum, addr from biz_clnt Where posNum=#{posNum}
mapper.delete: update biz_clnt set shutdown = 0 where posNum=#{posNum}
mapper.select: select posNum, IP, regNum, vanNum, repreName, compaName, phoneNum, addr, shutdown from biz_clnt where posNum > 0 order by shutdown desc
